title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Analytical and Strategic Development for Improving Conference Proposal Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in academic proposal writing and research background in mathematics
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Participants can explain at least three quality evaluation criteria for academic conference proposals.
Participants can develop strategies to align mathematical research topics with the mission of target academic conferences.
Participants can draft initial conference proposals and incorporate peer feedback through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
